ygData.subject: Re: Some web sites on research
ygData.msgSnippet: I found a couple of web sites on the research topice that I wanted to share, These would be considered spoilers so beware. This site is all about Enchanters,
ygData.messageBody:
I found a couple of web sites on the research topice that I wanted to share,
These would be considered spoilers so beware.

This site is all about Enchanters, under research it tell the diffrent spell
you get from combination of various pages, some lot of good stuff here if
you are an enchanter
http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest/

I had also found a web site for necros, but cant find the link, If anyone
know of a simmilar link for wizards, please let me know.


Uuno Darkstaff
